ShowDesc: Your perception has been temporarily heightened, deepening your connection with the world.
Ancient scripts nourish your soul, as you tirelessly take them in.
A figurine holding ancient echoes has now become a part of you.
The contract of Assimilation serves as your badge of loyalty. You've gained "approval."
Fragments of wisdom guide your quest for the world's truths.
You feel the Insight seeping into you. Maybe you're... getting close to the ultimate truth?
